title: Roblox Module​
content: Get the Roblox moduleInsert the module into your game

title: Features​
content: Easy to use - RoTime is designed to be as easy to use as possible. It's as simple as RoTime:GetTime() to get the current time.Customizable - RoTime is designed to be as customizable as possible. You can change the time format, timezone, and more.

title: What are formatting patterns?​
content: Formatting patterns are a way to format time. For example, if you wanted to format time to look like this: 12:00:00 AM, you would use the formatting pattern #h:#m:#s #a. Formatting patterns are used in the RoTime:format() method. Each pattern must begin with a "#" and end with a letter.

title: List of formatting patterns​
content: Pattern	Description	Type	Example#d	The day of the month	Number	1 #DD	Shortened day of the month	String	Mon #DDD	Full day of the month	String	Monday #mm	The month of the year	Number	1 #MM	Shortened month of the year	String	Jan #MMM	Full month of the year	String	January #y	The year	Number	2021 #h	The hour of the day (12 hour)	Number	1 #hh	The hour of the day (24 hour)	Number	13 #m	The minute of the hour	Number	1 #s	The second of the minute	Number	1 #a	The AM/PM of the time	String	AM
